name: KELLEY DRYE & WARREN
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the Tax Reform (Border Adjustment Tax),  HR 1393/S. 540, the Mobile Workforce State Income Tax Simplification Act, Tax Reform and Sec. 199.
All issues pertaining to seasonal guest workers under the H2A program.
Buy America provisions in the Dept of Interior Appropriations bill.  Funding for Hurricane disaster relief for agriculture.
